author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Some unused chunk of code was removed, starting from some issue reported by the static analyzer (having lot of those unsolved issues can hide the real one, if they show up: better to clean up when possible).

While doing so a bug was also found and fixed (harmless as soon as all collections to be validated are available)

#### PR validation:
It compiles.
There should be no differences at all in outputs
title: Remove dead branches and clean up GlobalRecHit validation
